file_content.text: Rachel, if you find this log, I'm probably dead. I'm on the delivery run to Belsavis, and things are looking sketchy.
I got the laser drills past the contraband scans, but I was dumb and took some fire from automated defenses right off the planet.
My comlink's not working, so I can't talk my way out of trouble if I'm spotted. Which means... I could get shot down.
If I do, find out if Hallen got his drills from the wreckage, then get that crime lord scumbag to pay up.
You're a tough girl, Rachel. And a damn good partner. I love you. Out.
